summary: dieser kleine mod ändert es so das mann von beginn an ,, alle Findlinge auf der karte sieht und hinreisen kann..

[/b][color=#b45f06]This mod add a Map maker to Skyrim for all [b]Doomstone´s
[/b][/color]you are allowed to do with the file everything you translate well or continue building[/center][color=#b45f06][b][/b][/color][/quote]


[center]
[b]Doomstone Travel Mods[/b]

[b]dieser [/b][u]kleine[/u][b] mod ändert es so das mann von beginn an ,, alle Findlinge auf der karte sieht und hinreisen kann.. und kleine überraschungen :-P[/b]

[b][color=#000000]mod[/color] [color=#ff0000]is[/color] [color=#ffff00]German[/color][/b]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]bat files for all languages but there are Cheats[/color][/u][/b]


[quote]Bat data

open your console .. bat name - name is unnamable


Allitems   - add many items to your inventar (1000)

itemsklein - add littel version add your inventar (50)

hybrid - make your Vampir & Werwolf full powerd

God - make you all skills , perks , life , mana , stamina , all overpowerd

stats - make all skills overpowerd no perks , no life , mana , stamina

Food - give your all Vanila anmd dlc food  ( dlc or not )

ench - give your all enchantment

dieb - You will practically invisible to all (even if you are still to be seen), except ye say, an NPC directly. Perfect for thieves. and bounty of 0

psb - give you all legal spells

spawn - add a new lydia for the player (rather unnecessarily)  or for the vampir bite .. for the better vampire mod start

carry - carryweight to Maximal

Arrow - add all vanila Arrows to your inventory (1000)

Skillbooks - add all the skillbooks to you inventory

open  - open the npc inventory .. in console click npc befor 

cheat - add you all magic skills overpowerd (250) no perks the other skills (55) all shouts and no loading , crafting skill and perks all

cheat2 - add more damage , boxing and spells , life , mana , stamina , overpowerd godlike :-P , more crit chance , faster with weapon , and resist , reflect damage

and the last for the race mod NINGHEIM and BETTER VAMPIRE mod 

Ningheim  - add the undead maker to the player ,[/quote][/center]
author: Mechias3Fallout
